memberdef.name: aug
memberdef.initializer: template <typename T1, typename T2> \ auto operator op##=(T1 &a, const T2 &b) { \ return a = a op b; \ }

briefdescription.para: Returns union of sets a and b.

memberdef.argsstring: (unordered_set< T > const &a, unordered_set< T > const &b, unordered_set< T > &ret)
memberdef.name: sub_set

memberdef.argsstring: (Iterator it, enable_if_t<!is_same< typename iterator_traits< decltype(it)>::iterator_category, random_access_iterator_tag >::value, ll > n)
memberdef.name: operator+

param.type: enable_if_t<!is_same< typename iterator_traits< decltype(it)>::iterator_category, random_access_iterator_tag >::value, ll >
